```python selenium_error_handling.py
from notte_sdk import NotteClient

client = NotteClient()

with client.Session() as session:
    page = session.page
    page.goto("https://example.com")

    try:
        page.click("button", timeout=5000)
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"Click failed: {e}")
```
